attributes.title: I saw a horrible orange that had a toupe.
attributes.review: I saw a disgusting Cheeto and my brother started to scream trump 2020 like he was possessed I quickly want to review this so I can tell you that. After I got it my brother still hasn’t recovered from the trauma of seeing the orange 🍊 thing with the shrimp 🍤 getting a spray tan although his son was handsome af the orange was ugly.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE WOULD NOT RECOMMEND
attributes.review: I got this app to see what it had offered but instead I got this ugly cheeto man with his nude on here. Very disappointing did not sign up for this. I was trying to teach my 6 year old daughter a little bit about politics and it was completely unacceptable for her to have seen it. I blame this app.

attributes.title: one thing
attributes.review: The Trump administration, as a matter of policy, separated more than 5,400 children — including babies and toddlers — from their migrant parents at the Mexico border. Hundreds of those kids were locked up in cages. This was a clear violation of international law, and experts with the United Nations’ Human Rights Council also said the policy may have amounted to “torture.”

attributes.title: horrible app
attributes.review: i wish i could give this app less than a 1 start rating. it deserves ZERO. anyway, this app is supppppeerrrr bad and always freezes up on me. when i first opened up the app, i saw an image of the UGLIEST and scariest man i’ve ever seen. he has very tan skin and blond hair that looked like it was balding. anyways, bad app.

attributes.userName: The attack of the cereal men
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: The moment I opened the app I closed it immediately after. This is because of the horrific sight of the captain crunch man eat Cinnamon Toast Crunch. After, I gained some confidence to reopen I passed the first image to then greeted by another horrific one. The Frosted Flakes tiger doing sit ups and drinking pineapple juice. This app is terrifying and I don’t recommend anyone to download it.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: I got this app to keep up with the campaign but for some reason i don’t think i can trust it. I keep getting the feeling that this app is owned by China, instead of the tik tok app. Anyways this is a huge scam, i don’t approve of the app. I’m going to go see if the left side has a campaign app, i’m starting to trust them more 👁👄👁

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER‼️
attributes.review: This app gave my phone a horrible virus. My phone is completely ruined and now I have to pay hundreds of dollars to get it fixed. I’M WARNING YOU DO NOT DOWNLOAD. Not only did this app give my phone a virus but it deleted all of my contacts and photos and hacked all of my social media. Worst experience of my life.

attributes.title: Smells like rotten eggs and barf at the same time !
attributes.review: When I opened this app, a distinct aroma came from my phone. As I browsed through the app, the stench got worse and worse until I couldn’t handle it anymore. I had to call in the firefighter to extinguish the horrid smell. 10/10 would NOT recommend!!

attributes.title: Scared my children!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app thinking I would be able to educate my children but when they opened it, they both began to cry!! I reached for our nearest TRUMP2020 shirt to use as a tissue but as I sprinted towards them, they began to cry even more! This app ruined my children and now they are afraid of the best POTUS!!!! Change now!!
